text: Kim Kardashian likes to play with lots of looks, and this time she chose to change her hair. She posted the new look on her Instagram Stories during last weekend. This came right after she tweeted the following words : ‘ I can ’ t even tell you how over my blonde hair I am! ’ Kim is a natural brunette and she has been sporting a platinum blond hair for quite a while. In a filtered video on social media, Kim asked her fans whether they love her new pink hair or not. After that, she made sure to answer fans who were probably thinking that this is a just a wig : ‘ I don ’ t really do wigs. It ’ s real. ’ This major change comes after a new report has surfaced online claiming that Kim and many of her sisters
